item.title: The Goldman Case Puts a Nation on Trial
item.description: Cédric Kahn’s landmark courtroom movie does what American filmmakers can’t.

item.title: Desperate Democrats Are Pushing Yet Another Version Of The Russia Collusion Hoax
item.description: The truth is, Russia isn’t interfering in the 2024 election nearly as much as Biden’s FBI and DOJ are right now.

item.title: Pro-Life Realism Post-Dobbs
item.description: Pro-lifers must hold whatever modest ground they can. And they have reasons to hope.

item.title: After Attempted Alford Plea, Hunter Biden Reluctantly Pleads Guilty To Avoid Messy Trial
item.description: Hunter Biden's defense attempted to change his plea from 'not guilty' to an 'Alford plea' and thereby avoid a trial.

item.description: Steve Daines is speculated as a potential candidate for Senate GOP leader in November, but he isn't announcing any such bid just yet.

item.title: Fight DEI in Higher Ed with Grades
item.description: To contest a worldview whose ultimate goal is to destroy merit, schools should double down on objective measurements of student success.

item.title: Democrats Are Weaponizing Dark Money And Ballot Initiatives To Turn Red States Blue
item.description: Left-wing groups funded by Dems' dark money machine have put initiatives on the 2024 ballot that seek to enshrine radical policies into law.
